reviews.review: Joguinho curto, mas muito bom, de fato se tiver promoção você tem que pegar!

This game broke my heart, why do they make a game about portals instead of working on an actual portal in real life. I think people are dumb nowdays, why not do something for real instead of doing a "VIDEOGAME" whats the point of it? The developers are du*bassm*therfu*kers and cant understand that this could save the planet from klimatförstöring just saying that if we had a portal in space and a portal in the middle of the earth we could transactions the air pockets between the scientific studies of the intergalactic forces between the scientific research studies.
really entertaining if you like puzzles this is the game for you

Proprio un bel gioco action-puzzle da giocare tutto d'un fiato (la prima volta si completa in una giornata senza troppo impegno). Si... effettivamente è un gioco forse un po' troppo breve: ci sarebbe stata bene ancora qualche ora di game-play ma è davvero un piccolo capolavoro e non fa rimpiangere dei (pochi) euro spesi per l'acquisto.
Challenging puzzles and a great story. Love the song at the end too.
просто крутая игра

The game is very, very good,
The narration is interesting and mysterious without overdoing it, the antagonist is hyper endearing, the levels and gameplay are PERFECT.
Too bad the game is so short, I finished it in a little more than an hour.

Experiencia 11/10.
Super Story, super Konzept, super Musik! Total empfehlenswert!

Česky

Portal, hra ve které se ocitnete neznámo jak v pasti s vyspělou umělou inteligencí která řídí celé výzkumné středisko a nutí Vás prodělávat její testy pomocí speciální portálové zbraně. Testovacích místností je mnoho a každá má svůj východ do dalšího testu ale existuje i nějaká cesta pryč?

Díky neustálým novinkám a různorodosti hádanek nebude hra stereotypní záležitostí jak by se mohlo zdát, naopak hra běží plynulým tempem za doprovodu neustálých poznámek umělé inteligence GLaDOS které vás bude neustále komandovat což zapříčiní touhu jít do dalšího testu jen aby jste přišli na způsob jak se ji zbavit a utéci pryč z vědeckého komplexu.

Hodnocení: 8/10

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

English

Portal, a game in which you find yourself unknown as trapped with advanced artificial intelligence that controls the entire research center and forces you to undergo its tests using a special portal weapon. There are many test rooms and each has its exit to the next test, but is there a way out?

Thanks to the constant news and variety of puzzles, the game will not be a stereotypical matter as it might seem, but the game runs at a steady pace accompanied by constant GLaDOS artificial intelligence notes that will constantly bother you, which will force you to find a way to destroy it and escape from the science complex

Rating: 8/10
Что сказать, абсолютная классика жанра. Захватывающая и загадочная история, головоломки, действительно ломающие мозг, и куча милых роботов - все это вы найдёте в Portal.

밸런스가 안맞는 난이도

파트별 난이도 차이가 심한데, 퍼즐게임이라서 보스전또한 퍼즐로 만들었는데 한번 때리고 나면 어캐해야되는지 감 잡혀서 너무 쉽습니다. 그런데 그에 비해 글라도스 찾아가는 파트는 너무 어렵습니다. 근데 길 알면 난이도 급하락합니다.

Portal - это такой небольшой эксперимент который после вылился в возможно одну из лучших игр поколения: собсна вторую часть. Сказал бы что слишком короткая, но прохождение дополнительных челленджей продлит игру в два, а то и в три раза. Ну и не могу не отметить саунд. Композиция из титров Still Alive в свое время стала фурором и вполне заслуженно.
Однозначно рекомендую.
It was very fun when I played it for the first time!
К сожалению, игра стала моей любимой и теперь мой дом похож на тестовую площадку :)

Muito bom, depois de anos eu finalmente pude jogá-lo e vou dizer: é um jogo excelente, sem iguais. Vale muito a pena comprar e se tiver um amigo pra jogar junto, fica muito melhor! É de 2011 mas consegue ser melhor do que muitos jogos atuais.

Portal is a very strategy based game and though its graphics definitely aren't the best, it is an amazing and wonderful game for its time. It is so easy to lose track of time whilst playing this game because it requires you to really scrub together those 2 brain cells and come up with a solution to the current situation.
